name: Saturn Valkyrie Dione
description:
"Saturn Valkyrie Dione" is an 8 direction run&gun (Contra style) where you control Dione, guardian of the planet Saturn, in his fight agains the evil mecha-saurs poisoning her planet.

This game was made in under 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 34 Jam.

Link to the Ludum Dare 34 entry

Game by itoaragon (graphics, programation), esciron (music,sound, programation), trolldinger (programation, level design).

Enjoy it!
